title: 2025 Dubai tennis prize money
description: The Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships has released its prize money breakdown for the 2025 edition of the ATP 500 event in Dubai. The prize pool will be USD $3,237,670. The singles champion will earn USD $605,530. The doubles team that wins will split USD $198,880. html:
Tournament News

View round-by-round breakdown

February 23, 2025

AFP/Getty Images

The Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships will be held from 24 February - 1 March. By ATP Staff

The Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships has released its prize money breakdown for the 2025 edition of the ATP 500 event in Dubai. The prize pool will be USD $3,237,670.

The singles champion will earn USD $605,530. The doubles team that wins will split USD $198,880.

View the full prize-money breakdown and the PIF ATP Rankings points at stake below.

2025 Dubai Singles Prize Money

 Round  Points  Prize Money
 Champion  500  $605,530
 Finalist 330  $325,780
 Semi-finalist  200  $173,620
 Quarter-finalist  100  $88,700
 R16  50  $47,350
 R32  0  $25,250

2025 Dubai Doubles Prize Money (per team)

 Round  Points  Prize Money
 Champion  500  $198,880
 Finalist  300  $106,060
 Semi-finalist  180  $53,660
 Quarter-finalist  90  $26,840
 R16  0  $13,980
